I'm trying to translate the NBTHK on an early Edo
period tsuba. The tsuba is of small size and shape,
and I guess relatively late for its school, but I'm
having a heck of a time translating 1 line of the
papers.

Anyone good with tsuba papers willing to volunteer to
help? I've a photo of them to send over.

Thanks,

Curran
